title: Concrete Slab Volume Calculator

seo.title: Concrete Slab Volume Calculator | Cubic Yards & Bags
seo.description: Estimate slab concrete volume in cubic yards and number of 80-lb bags from length, width, and thickness.

summary: Contractor-friendly concrete takeoff for small slabs.
formula: const volume_cuft = length_ft * width_ft * (thickness_in / 12); const cubic_yards = volume_cuft / 27; const bags_80lb = cubic_yards * 45; return { volume_cuft, cubic_yards, bags_80lb };

faq.a: It does not. Add 5-10% for spillage and uneven subgrade.
